{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Intrinsyc CerfCube - WebServer |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Intrinsyc |model = CerfCube |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = web server |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel StrongARM;SA-1110;StrongARM 1110;GDS1110BC; |cpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- ARM Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 192<!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Intel;E28F128-J3A150; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = IBM;Microdrive; |flash2size = 340 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = Micron;48LC8M16A2-75B; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = Crystal;CS8900A-CQ; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 10MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:D0:CA
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = Iboot;1.1.1;; |stockos = Windows;Embedded CE;;
|exp_if_types = CompactFlash, USB 1.1 (slave), |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = 1 |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.4 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 3.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 1.3 |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, DE-9, (38400 8N1), |jtag = yes,, 7-pin header,, populated,, J3
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = UART, GPIO, metal case, |addchip = 3.3V-5V RS232 3-Driver/5-Receiver Transceiver;Linear Technology;LTC1348;;1;,,, 4K-bit 3-Wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT93C66;;1;,,, Dual Output Low-Dropout Voltage Regulator;TI;TPS767D301;;1;,,, Hex Inverter w/ Schmitt Trigger Input;Fairchild;74LVX14;;1;,,, Quad 2-Input OR Gate;Fairchild;74LVX32;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.0.100 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = Linux
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 05/2001 |estprice = 379 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Canada
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *CPU: ''[[Intel]]'' StrongARM 1110 (GDS1110BC) :@192MHz ARM *RAM: 32MB DR SDRAM *Storage: 16MB NOR, 340MB Intel CFII+ Microdrive *Network: 1x 10MB Ethernet *USB: 1x USB 1.1 *Power: 5V/2.4A barrel *Dimensions (L x W x H): 3in x 3in x 3in
==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[https://linuxdevices.org/honey-i-shrunk-the-linux-system-a/ ''Honey, I shrunk the Linux system!'' on '''LinuxDevices Archive'''] *[http://www.davespda.com/reviews/cerfcube.htm ''Intrinsyc CerfCube'' on '''Dave's PDA Place''']
[[Category:English Documentation]]
